children.value: 37. Write a C program to count the number of occurrences of any two vowels in succession in a line of text. For example, in the sentence “Pleases read this application and give me gratuity” such occurrences are ea, ea, ui

enter the line: hello funycode
two vowels in succesion are:
occurence of two vowels in succesion =  0
